trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"></xref> for registering a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"></xref> The service host will have multiple endpoints registered based on the number of listeners registered in the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"> </xref> para registrar um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"> </xref> o host de serviço terá vários pontos de extremidade registrados com base no número de ouvintes registrados na configuração.

trans-unit.source: By default, the WSTrustServiceHost class provides the following: - It adds WS-Trust endpoints to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> based on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TrustEndpoints%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, a classe WSTrustServiceHost fornece o seguinte:-adiciona pontos de extremidade WS-Trust para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>com base no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TrustEndpoints%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TrustEndpoints%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: - It enables metadata over the base addresses if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.DisableWsdl%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: -Habilita metadados sobre os endereços de base se o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.DisableWsdl%2A>está definida como `false`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.DisableWsdl%2A>

trans-unit.source: - It configures the service certificate on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> service credentials if a WIF configuration section specifies a service certificate.
trans-unit.target: -Ele configura o certificado de serviço no <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>credenciais de serviço se uma seção de configuração do WIF Especifica um certificado de serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: Note that this will override the equivalent service certificate settings in WCF configuration.
trans-unit.target: Observe que isso substituirá as configurações de certificado de serviço equivalente na configuração do WCF.

trans-unit.source: - It integrates IdentityModel token handlers into the security processing pipeline by calling the ExtensibleSecurityCredentials.ConfigureServiceHost method on itself.
trans-unit.target: -Ele se integra IdentityModel manipuladores de token no pipeline de processamento de segurança chamando o método ExtensibleSecurityCredentials.ConfigureServiceHost em si mesmo.

trans-unit.source: The WSTrustServiceHost class may be overridden to customize this behavior.
trans-unit.target: A classe WSTrustServiceHost pode ser substituída para personalizar esse comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost"></xref> class with the specified base addresses and service (STS) configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost"> </xref> classe com os endereços de base especificados e as definições de configuração (STS) de serviço.

trans-unit.source: A default <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract> is created using the specified <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration> instance.
trans-unit.target: Um padrão <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract>é criado usando especificado <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>instância.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration> instance is used for one-time initialization of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>; for this reason, setting properties on the configuration instance after the host is initialized may not result in behavior changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>instância é usada para inicialização única do <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>; por esse motivo, as propriedades de configuração na instância de configuração depois de inicializar o host não pode resultar em alterações de comportamento.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> that contains the STS settings to use to initialize the service host.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"> </xref> que contém as configurações de STS para usar para inicializar o host de serviço.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Uri> that contains the base addresses for the service host.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Uri>que contém os endereços de base para o host de serviço.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost"></xref> class with the specified base addresses and service contract.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost"> </xref> classe com os endereços de base especificados e o contrato de serviço.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract"></xref> that represents the service contract to use.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract"> </xref> que representa o contrato de serviço a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Uri> that contains the base addresses for the service host.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Uri>que contém os endereços de base para o host de serviço.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: baseAddresses is .
trans-unit.target: baseAddressesis .

trans-unit.source: -or- serviceContract is .
trans-unit.target: -or- serviceContract is .

trans-unit.source: Loads the service description information from the configuration file and applies it to the runtime that is being constructed.
trans-unit.target: Carrega as informações de descrição de serviço do arquivo de configuração e aplica-se ao tempo de execução que está sendo construído.

trans-unit.source: Configures metadata (WSDL) for the service host.
trans-unit.target: Define metadados (WSDL) para o host de serviço.

trans-unit.source: This method evaluates the base addresses of the service host, and adds mex endpoints for http, https, net.tcp, and net.pipe addresses, only when no mex endpoints have been previously added by the user.
trans-unit.target: Esse método avalia os endereços base do host do serviço e adiciona pontos de extremidade mex para http, https, NET. TCP e endereços de NET. pipe, somente quando nenhum ponto de extremidade mex foram adicionados anteriormente pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: For http and https addresses, HTTP and HTTPS, the GET mechanism for WSDL retrieval is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Para endereços http e https, HTTP e HTTPS, o mecanismo GET para recuperação de WSDL está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: Override of the base class method.
trans-unit.target: Substituição do método da classe base.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceConfiguration"></xref> on the service host and then invokes the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: Configura o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceConfiguration"> </xref> no host de serviço e, em seguida, invoca a implementação base.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost.UpdateServiceConfiguration%2A> method and then invokes the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost.UpdateServiceConfiguration%2A>método e, em seguida, invoca a implementação base.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost.UpdateServiceConfiguration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the security token service (STS) configuration for this this instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a configuração de serviço de token (STS) de segurança para este essa instância.

trans-unit.source: The STS configuration.
trans-unit.target: A configuração de STS.

trans-unit.source: Gets the service contract associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o contrato de serviço associado a essa instância.

trans-unit.source: The service contract for this instance.
trans-unit.target: O contrato de serviço para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials.IdentityConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.Credentials*> property of the service host with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration*> property.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials.IdentityConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> no <> </> *> propriedades do host do serviço com o <> </> *> propriedade.
